job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: pOur healthcare client is looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join their team ppbrppThe Project Working on a service layer that converts native API mostly built in JSON format to a HL7 FHIR API to interconnect health systemsppbrppYour Background Experience developing software with Java FHIR knowledge is a plusppbrppJob ResponsibilitiespulliServe as a senior software developer for the software platform developing FHIRbased REST APIsliliAllocated time on averagelili75 of the time codinglili25 of the time collaborating with solution architectsBAQA on overall software implantation design and best practicesliliProvide input on software solution designsliliWork across all teams as a subject matter expectliliMentor junior software developers on coding designs and best practicesliulpbrppbrppRequired Skillspulli6 years of experience with hands on development with C or Javalili8 years of experience devlili2 years of experience EHR clinical integrationslili2 years of experience with integrating services into a cloud architecturelili2 years of experience working with Docker containersliliExperience working in Agile environmentliulpbrppstrongWe cannot provide sponsorship upon conversionstrongppbrppWhat skillsattributes are preferred will set a candidate apartpulli2 years of experience with good understanding on FHIR standardlili2 years of experience developing RESTFUL APIsliliThe ability to execute existing queries as well as write SQL queries of varying complexityliliExperience with GIT for code repositoryliliExperience with Jenkins for deployment automationliliUnderstanding of software development processes and methodologiesliliCollaborate in team environmentliul
